roleset.name: (cause to) be in a vertical position
roleset.note: STAND-V NOTES: Frames file for 'stand' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet classes assuming_position-50,put_spatial-9.2-1, spatial_configuration-47.6. (from stand.01-v)

example.name: no agent
example.text: [On one side of this power struggle]-1 stand *trace*-1 theforces in ascendency on Wall Street -- the New Guard -- consistingof high-tech computer wizards at the major brokerage firms, theirpension fund clients with immense pools of money, and the tradersat the fast-growing Chicago futures exchanges.
example.arg: the forces in ascendency on Wall Street -- the New Guard -- consisting of high-tech computer wizards at the majorbrokerage firms, their pension fund clients with immense pools ofmoney, and the traders at the fast-growing Chicago futuresexchanges

example.name: with agent
example.text: John stood his toy soldiers against the wall.

roleset.name: be poised for an action
roleset.note: STAND-V NOTES: (from stand.02-v)

example.name: they all look like this
example.text: The management group owns about 18% of the stock, most purchased at nominal prices, and would stand to gain millions ofdollars if the company were sold.
example.arg: to gain millions of dollars if the company were sold

roleset.name: tolerate
roleset.note: STAND-V NOTES: Member of VN class admire-31.2. (from stand.03-v)

example.name: That is something up with which I shall not put
example.text: An undistinguished college student who dabbled in zoology until he concluded that he couldn't stand cutting up frogs, Mr.Corry wanted to work for a big company ``that could do bigthings.''

roleset.name: be
roleset.note: STAND-V NOTES: (from stand.04-v)

example.name: typical usage
example.text: An index of economic activity drawn from the survey stood last month at 47.6%;
example.arg: An index of economic activity drawn from the survey

roleset.name: represent
roleset.note: STAND-V NOTES: Frame by Claire (from stand.08-v)

example.name: financial
example.text: [The proportion]-1 that this stood for *T*-1 in the entirecountry's totalimport-export value rose from the previous year's37% to 39%.
example.arg: in the entire country's total import-export value

roleset.name: have a strong stance, having a strong position on a subject matter
roleset.note: STAND-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on noun corpus examples. No correspondingVNcls. (from stand.01-n)
STANCE-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on noun corpus examples.No corresponding VNcls. (from stance.01-n)
STANCED-J NOTES: Added by Julia to correspond to stance-n.01. (from stanced.01-j)

roles.note: Very, very often occurs in light verb constructions. (from stand.01-n) Very, very often occurs in light verb constructions. (from stance.01-n)

example.name: light verb!
example.text: ... is one of the cabinet ministers who-1 *trace*-1 take the clearest stand against nuclear power .

example.name: all args
example.text: Chinese lawmakers said the two can only return if they `` abandon their antagonistic stand against the Chinese government

example.name: weird tree
example.text: the Republicans are seen drawing support for their `` Germans First '' stand on social - welfare issues .

example.name: all args
example.text: While still touting his pro-choice stand on abortion ...

example.name: Args 0 and 1, within LVC
example.text: The majority of Lords don't make a 'tribal' stance because there's recognition that...

example.name: Nominal, demonstrating other descriptions that aren't arg1
example.text: The CCP earned great popular support for their aggressive stance against the Japanese.

roleset.name: balance upside down
roleset.note: STAND-N NOTES: Based on Bolt data. No comparison. No VN or FN classes. (from stand.04-n)

role.descr: balanced on; type of stand (hand, head)

example.name: head stand
example.text: He did a head stand

roleset.name: be ready
roleset.note: STAND_BY-V NOTES: (from stand.05-v)

example.name: correspondent
example.text: Gary Tuchman standing by in Chicago.

roleset.name: be noticeable
roleset.note: STAND_OUT-V NOTES: (from stand.06-v)

example.text: One assignment stands out.

roleset.name: rise, perhaps in defense or opposition
roleset.note: STAND_UP-V NOTES: Roleset corresponds to VN class assuming_position-50. (from stand.07-v)

role.descr: entity opposed; stand up to or against

example.name: stand_up-v: all rise
example.text: We want to stand up.

example.name: stand_up-v: by metaphorical extension... stand up for
example.text: And Dave did n't stand up for me .

example.name: stand_up-v: arg2 as proposition
example.text: Armin Wegner, the German who *-1 stood up to genocide of both Armenians and Jews
example.arg: to the genocide of both Armenians and Jews

example.name: stand_up-v: arg2 as bully
example.text: Instead, they've stood up to their critics in the best way possible.

roleset.name: not show up for a date
roleset.note: STAND_UP-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on Call Home. No VNcls. (from stand.09-v)

example.name: both args
example.text: I mean I think it 's valid for you to yell at him-1 for *trace*-1 standing you guys up and stuff .

roleset.name: stand up comedy act
roleset.note: STAND_UP-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on sms. (from stand.03-n)

example.name: LVB
example.text: I ask because Neal brennan . His writer is performing stand up at johnny Brenda 's and I 'm a big fan . Wanted to ask if u d be interested in going

roleset.name: (cause to) back off, withdraw
roleset.note: STAND_DOWN-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from stand.10-v)

example.name: arg1
example.text: I do n't think Nick Clegg should stand down .

example.name: all args
example.text: We've stood him down from training and playing until his court appearance on April 18, then we'll reassess
example.arg: until his court appearance on April 18

roleset.name: keg_stand, do a handstand on a keg, while drinking from the keg
roleset.note: KEG_STAND-N NOTES: Based on Bolt data. No comparison. No VN or FN classes. (from stand.02-n)
KEGSTAND-J NOTES: Added by Julia for unification. (from kegstand.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: During the reception the PRB keg stands begin

roleset.name: having particular leg-positioning, when standing
roleset.note: STANCED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. (from stanced.02-j)

example.name: both args
example.text: Gait : Her gait is wide stanced , and she limps .

roleset.name: stalemate, deadlock, be at an impasse
roleset.note: STANDOFF-N NOTES: Added by Julia, Meredith for Google.

example.name: standoff-n
example.text: The standoff between Right Sector and the authorities over the status of the nationalist group's military unit reached a fever pitch on April 29
example.arg: between Right Sector and the authorities
over the status of the nationalist group's military unit

roleset.name: having existed for a long time
roleset.note: LONGSTANDING-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on AMR occurrence.

example.name: longstanding-j
example.text: A study of middle-school students that found for the first time that abstinence-only education helped to delay their sexual initiation is already beginning to shake up the longstanding debate over how best to prevent teenage pregnancy and sexually transmitted diseases .
